    Description
    AuthenticationException
    Exception thrown when authentication fails (invalid credentials, etc.).
    BusinessLogicException
    Exception for business logic errors in the application.
    DatabaseException
    Exception for database-related errors in the application.
    NetworkException
    Exception for network and RMI-related errors in the application.
    SecurityException
    Base exception for security-related errors in the application.
    ValidationException
    Exception thrown when input validation fails or potential injection is detected.
